pages.text: These are all of the recipe changes pertaining to Malum.

$(li)Added two Onyx Shards to Spirit Altar.$(li)Hex Ash needs Mana Powder instead of Gunpowder.$(li)Soul Stained Steel needs Manasteel instead of Iron.$(li)Doubled (Char)coal Fragment recipe.$(li)Added missing Charcoal Fragment conversion recipes.
